description: A production-ready workflow management system to manage the end-to-end purchase lifecycle: from requisition through supplier selection, purchase order issuance, goods receipt, invoice verification and payment, with master-data driven lookups and role-based access.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow

columns.name: Serial No
columns.description: Sequential serial number for sheet rows

columns.name: Purchase ID
columns.description: Primary identifier for the purchase transaction (primary key)

columns.name: Planned1
columns.description: Stage 1 planned completion date (Requisition planned date)

columns.name: Actual1
columns.description: Stage 1 actual completion date (Requisition actual date)

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Days delayed = DATEDIFF(Planned1, Actual1) (or 0 if Actual <= Planned). Formula-based

columns.name: Requested By
columns.description: Name of employee who raised requisition

columns.name: Requestor ID
columns.description: Employee ID of requestor (links to HR/Dept master)

columns.name: Department
columns.description: Department requesting the purchase (links to Department Master)

columns.name: Items Summary
columns.description: High-level summary or link to item lines (line-level data may be imported/attached)

columns.name: Currency
columns.description: Currency for estimated/PO values (links to Currency Master)

columns.name: Planned2
columns.description: Stage 2 planned completion date (Approval planned date)

columns.name: Actual2
columns.description: Stage 2 actual completion date (Approval actual date)

columns.name: Approval Date if approved
columns.description: Date approver approved (duplicate of Actual2 if used)

columns.name: RFQ Sent To Vendor IDs
columns.description: List of vendor IDs to whom RFQs were issued (links to Vendor Master)

columns.name: Selected Vendor ID
columns.description: Vendor chosen for PO (links to Vendor Master)

columns.name: Planned4
columns.description: Stage 4 planned completion date (PO creation planned)

columns.name: Actual4
columns.description: Stage 4 actual completion date (PO creation actual)

columns.name: PO Currency
columns.description: Currency of PO (links to Currency Master)

columns.name: Payment Terms ref
columns.description: Payment terms key (links to Terms Master)

columns.name: Planned5
columns.description: Stage 5 planned completion date (PO approval planned)

columns.name: Actual5
columns.description: Stage 5 actual completion date (PO approval actual)

columns.name: Planned6
columns.description: Stage 6 planned completion date (Vendor confirmation planned)

columns.name: Actual6
columns.description: Stage 6 actual completion date (Vendor confirmation actual)

columns.name: Planned7
columns.description: Stage 7 planned completion date (Goods Receipt planned)

columns.name: Actual7
columns.description: Stage 7 actual completion date (Goods Receipt actual)

columns.name: Planned9
columns.description: Stage 9 planned completion date (Invoice verification planned)

columns.name: Actual9
columns.description: Stage 9 actual completion date (Invoice verification actual)

columns.name: Tax Amount
columns.description: Tax value on invoice (links to Tax Master)

columns.name: Archive LocationRef
columns.description: Link or reference to archived documents

columns.name: Post-Implementation Notes
columns.description: Lessons learned, vendor performance notes, warranty or SLA references

columns.name: Owner
columns.description: Business owner accountable for the purchase

columns.name: Last Updated By
columns.description: User who last modified the row

columns.name: Attachment Link
columns.description: Link to supporting documents (PR, RFQ, PO, Invoice, GRN, Inspection report)

columns.name: RiskIssues Flags
columns.description: Open risks or issues related to purchase

stages.stage_description: Requisition raised by requestor with items, estimated value and priority.
Issue RFQs, collect quotations and select supplier(s).
Create Purchase Order (PO) based on selected supplier and terms.
Internal approval of PO prior to issuance to vendor.
Vendor confirms PO, acceptance, expected ship/delivery date and acknowledgement number.
Receipt of goods at site/warehouse and GRN generation.
Vendor invoice receipt, matching (PO/GRN/Invoice) and verification for payment.
Finalize transaction, archive documents and close purchase record.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the entire purchase lifecycle. Each stage is grouped and contains Planned, Actual, Delay (formula) as the first three columns of the stage.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Catalog of items/products to be purchased. Used for lookups in workflow.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: List of approved vendors and key vendor attributes.

sheets.name: Currency Master
sheets.description: Supported currencies and conversion reference (if needed).

sheets.name: Payment Methods
sheets.description: Allowed payment types for payment processing.

sheets.name: Terms Master
sheets.description: Standard payment and delivery terms for POs.

sheets.name: Import Dump
sheets.description: Staging area for bulk imports (line-level items, invoices, GRNs).
